# NSSlider.TickMarkPosition.below

**Case**

A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed below the slider.

## Declaration

```swift
case below
```

## Configuring Horizontal Sliders

- **NSSlider.TickMarkPosition.above**: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed above the slider.
